label: ProcessCertification
comment: The process of certifying that a process has met performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced standard applicable to this process certification.
An assertion, expressed as text, for this process certification.
The code specifying the assertion for this process certification, such as a claim that the process is free from child labour.
A referenced location related to this process certification.
An agency, expressed as text, responsible for this process certification.
A sustainability assertion specified for this process certification.
A standard, expressed as text, used for this process certification.

referencedBy.comment: A process certification applicable to this process certificate.
